PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProductRequirements
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Categorization of the required properties of an entity that are used to determine what the level of the requirement is, to enable its performance/quality to be determined, assessed, or measured, and compared against the requirement, and then to analyze whether the entity is suitable for use within a given context..

PropertyDef.Name: Name
PropertyDef.Definition: Subject matter for which a value is to be reported.

PropertyDef.Name: Category
PropertyDef.Definition: A reference to a classification of the degree of aggregation or granularity of topic data such as regional, local etc.

PropertyDef.Name: Classification
PropertyDef.Definition: A reference to a classification of the topic

PropertyDef.Name: DemandValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Value of the subject matter as determined using an agreed scale for what is required.

PropertyDef.Name: DemandThresholdValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Value of the subject matter above or below which a special significance is attached.

PropertyDef.Name: DemandImportanceValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Importance of the topic relative to the importance of other topics.

PropertyDef.Name: SupplyEvaluationValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Value of the subject matter as determined using an agreed scale for what is provided, or capable of being provided.

PropertyDef.Name: GapValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Difference determined between the topic demand value and the topic supply evaluation value.

PropertyDef.Name: GapValueWeighted
PropertyDef.Definition: Difference determined between the topic demand value and the topic supply evaluation value, weighted for topic demand importance value.
